response.overview: Solaria is on routine inspection of an abandoned warehouse. Out of nowhere, she's hit with a sedative dart. First one, then two, and they just keep coming. At first she's cocky, but soon she finds herself having trouble even standing. A villain presents himself and through her haze, she hears him describe how he's preparing her for his master to feed on. She doesn't know why, but she realizes her arousal is beginning to take her over. Between the darts, an injection, and a topical solution, the villain continues to administer aphrodisiac substances. She's left entirely powerless, defenseless and humiliated. What's worse, she's so overcome by arousal, she's begging to taken. Find out if she survives when the master arrives...
response.title: Solaria Consumed
